arts.ttl: Serie A | Cagliari 2-1 Parma: Match Report
arts.sum: In a high-stakes encounter at the bottom of Serie A, Cagliari emerged victorious with a 2-1 win over Parma, propelling themselves away from the relegation zone and condemning their opponents to a third consecutive defeat. The post Serie A | Cagliari 2-1 Parma: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Cagliari v Parma: Probable starting lineups
arts.sum: As Cagliari and Parma prepare for their crucial Serie A clash, the two sides find themselves in contrasting situations regarding squad availability. Cagliari coach Davide Nicola could have a full complement of players to choose from, as Zito Luvumbo has completed his recovery from an ankle injury. The post Serie A | Cagliari v Parma: Probable starting lineups appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Cagliari vs. Parma, a crucial game at the bottom
arts.sum: Since November 2024, Parma have lost eight of their 13 league games (W3 D2); in that period only Monza (10) have suffered more defeats than the Gialloblu in Serie A. Cagliari have lost six of their last 10 home matches in Serie A (W3 D1); from mid-September 2024, only Monza have lost more in the competition (7 home defeats).

arts.ttl: Cagliari’s Nicola: “Luvumbo Returns to Squad, Transfer Market? We Did What We Could”
arts.sum: Cagliari manager Davide Nicola has announced that Zito Luvumbo will be available for selection in the upcoming match against Parma. During his press conference, Nicola stated, "I will bring him with us in the squad. I want him to breathe the atmosphere of the match." The post Cagliari’s Nicola: “Luvumbo Returns to Squad, Transfer Market? We Did What We Could” appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Cagliari v Parma: Match Preview
arts.sum: Cagliari and Parma are set to face off in a high-stakes encounter at the Unipol Domus on Sunday. With both teams teetering on the brink of the relegation zone, separated by just a single point, this match could prove pivotal in determining their top-flight futures.
